website_summaries.verdict: A mermaid tail that's more fashion-forward than other options; in sizes for both children and adults.
pros: Glitter design offers more style and sophistication than traditional scale pattern
Fits true to size, especially in child sizes
Holds color when washed according to directions
cons: Some durability concerns and reports of glitter coming off in the water

customer_reviews.title: great idea! great product!
customer_reviews.text: Just make sure your kid knows how to swim in it correctly. We had her swim coach give her some one-on-one lessons on how to swim in it before we let her use it regularly- it's especially hard on the abs, so expect some sore muscles at first. Btw our daughter is 4.5 yrs, but a strong swimmer.
customer_reviews.author: Suzie Glaser

customer_reviews.title: ... girls who used this at my granddaughter's birthdaypool party loved it. My granddaughter said she was getting her ...
customer_reviews.text: The thirteen pre-teen girls who used this at my granddaughter's birthdaypool party loved it. My granddaughter said she was getting her dream of being a mermaid! You need to have kids try it out in short distances to make sure they are strong enough swimmers to feel comfortable using it. For the shorter girls we just rolled the suit up a few times to keep it around their waists.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Manatos

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: This is the second mermaid tail that we have purchased from this company. The first was for my oldest child. Her tail had rubber reinforced tips on her fin to prevent holes and snags. My youngest tail did not come with rubber reinforcements and tore on the first use in an in-ground pool. I contacted the company and have not heard back from them. Way too expensive not to last Several swimming seasons.
customer_reviews.author: Erika Dykstra

customer_reviews.title: Not true to size
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 9 and wears a size 10 in clothing. I ordered the size 12 and it barely fits let alone leaving any room for growth. Way too expensive to not be true to size.
customer_reviews.author: C. Buckner

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it! Took her all of 2 minutes to figure out how to swim in it, and now she cruises around with ease! Only negative is that some of the glitter comes off. We can see it floating in the pool. It will be interesting to see how long it lasts...
customer_reviews.author: DavidT

customer_reviews.title: Dont use it pool side.  The cement will tear it near the corners of the tail
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. My kid loves it and everykid who sees it loves it and wants to wear it. Great in the bathtub too.
customer_reviews.author: Smart

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my daughter's birthday! We had a ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter's birthday! We had a mermaid pool party. I manage a swim school and have bought other tails. This one seems as though it will last longer than the previous ones I bought from a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Hydro

customer_reviews.title: ... and the tail is a lil long but fits perfect. After a few uses we have already used ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought my daughter 1 size larger than she wears and the tail is a lil long but fits perfect. After a few uses we have already used the patches but that was after a partywhen she let other kids use the tail. Otherwise this is the best gift. My daughter loves it and had no problems swimming with the tail or fin.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great Birthday Present
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my granddaughter's 6th birthday. She had a mermaid party and this was a big hit. All the girls loved it. She looked like an actual mermaid swimming in the pool. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall, we are happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter loves it! The seams needed some reinforcing, and fortunately we were able to do that ourselves.
customer_reviews.author: Del-a-where?

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loved this.
customer_reviews.text: Wow, my daughter used this a lot in our pool this past summer. She will definitely get another season out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Riggleman

customer_reviews.title: Product is almost pefect, a little bit large for ...
customer_reviews.text: Product is almost pefect, a little bit large for my daughter. But seller took almost 5 days to ship it.
customer_reviews.author: Mauricio Damus

customer_reviews.title: A great gift.
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old granddaughter loves it, and can't wait to wear it in the pool. For now she's sporting it in the living room.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, worth the cost!
customer_reviews.text: We were leery of spending so much on a "toy" but this was worth every cent! Great quality product and works very well for our daughter. She uses it way more than anticipated because she loves it so much! We purchased the size outlined in the charts and it fits well. We'd recommend this item to anyone!

customer_reviews.text: After measuring according to the instructions, this item fit as expected and was received timely.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter wears it to our community swimming pool....Thank you so much for a quality product!

customer_reviews.title: Amazing job!
customer_reviews.text: Quick shipping. This is my second mermaid tail I've bought from you. Amazing job!

customer_reviews.title: Mermaid tail fun
customer_reviews.text: Somewhat expensive, but my daughter loves this Mermaid Tail. She's 7 and puts it on in the house and in the pool. Obviously I have safety concerns, but a great way to get her off the computer for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Bud Kilmer

customer_reviews.title: So cool!
customer_reviews.text: This tail is great, and my 12 year old is over the moon! The fabric is nice and seems like it will hold up well. THe only thing that made me pause was the holes for your feet in the monofin. They are so small. It took some maneuvering to get my daughter's feet in the first few times, but the holes seem to stretch a bit the more you use it, so don't be discouraged. I will write more in the middle of the summer to let you know how it is holding up.
customer_reviews.author: Alison K.

customer_reviews.title: This mermaid tail was a huge hit with my 7 ...
customer_reviews.text: This mermaid tail was a huge hit with my 7 year old. It was a Christmas present and she ended up wearing it all day while laying down watching tv!

customer_reviews.title: Kid loves it!

customer_reviews.title: GORGEOUS, quality, & super fun!
customer_reviews.text: My 7-year-old daughter was ECSTATIC to receive this! It was from Santa, so it was exactly what she asked him for, except in a slightly different color, (she had wanted pink, but, that wasn't available at the time I ordered). She truly felt, (& looked) like a beautiful mermaid at one of our last vacations, to the amazement of all the other children around. Gorgeous & quality materials. Definitely worth every penny!

customer_reviews.title: Keeps it's shine!
customer_reviews.text: The only downside to this item is the price. It's pretty spendy, but after seeing the look on my daughter's face when she opened it up, it was worth it. She wears it in the jacuzzi tub, swimming pool and lake. It washes well, keeps that shiny look just like the picture shows. We have no complaints about this product. If it weren't so expensive, I'd buy her one in every color! Quality is great though, so no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: April S.

customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it already! We haven't been able to try it out in the water yet but she's looking forward to it!

customer_reviews.text: Just what she always wanted, to be a mermaid. Dreams come true with the Fin Fun Monotail.

customer_reviews.title: Little Mermaid
customer_reviews.text: Our granddaughter is the hit of the pool with her mermaid tail! She adores it!

customer_reviews.title: It's really cool. She LOVES it
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our 8 year old daughter for Christmas. It's really cool. She LOVES it! It's really like being a mermaid. They also delivered before Christmas and responded prompt to my request for a quicker delivery. My daughter loves to watch the fun fin videos online.
customer_reviews.author: melissa montes

customer_reviews.title: Mermaid fun in the sun
customer_reviews.text: My eight year old has been wanting this and I wasn't sure but after reading the high reviews we purchased . First it is sent in a beautiful box with mesh shimmery bag. The inside of the box has a positive message about dreams do come true with bubble art on the inside card board . This presentation makes a perfect gift. More importantly, the material is high quality n the fit was perfect. Based on the size chart I ordered 1 size larger . It fits to comfortable n there is plenty if room as she grows. She loves her mermaid swim fun and has fun swimming as a mermaid.
customer_reviews.author: Rebeca

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed, already has holes and falling apart
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved this tail and the color was beautiful. The quality for the price is really bad. My daughter has only worn the tail 5 times and there are holes in the fabric at the tip of the tail and on her butt where she sits. I feel like this will be trash after a few more uses. I am very disappointed considering how expensive this is.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits great, I bought her one size higher
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 8 yr old daughter, she loves it! Fits great, I bought her one size higher. The best surprise gift ever! She's been wearing it all over the house and even in the bathtub.
customer_reviews.author: Rayna totino

customer_reviews.title: She has swam in it twice and seems to be holding up nicely. Do not expect the child to be able ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this! She has swam in it twice and seems to be holding up nicely. Do not expect the child to be able to walk once the tail is on. The mono fin makes the outfit. We would be disappointed if we hadn't purchased it with the mono fin. We bought a size up for my daughter and it seems to fit great. I would've given it a full 5 stars except there is a little threading coming loose on the material. I'm not too concerned about it but I was surprised to see it happening so soon.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke K.

customer_reviews.title: We have a real Mermaid on our hands!!

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! My daughter lit up when it arrived & ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! My daughter lit up when it arrived & was so excited to try it out. It worked great in the pool. Just had to hang it up to air dry.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my 5 year old Grand Daughter. She is tall for her age, I ordered a size 10 and it is a little long on her. With the mermaid tail being fitted, we could take up the slack, fold it over at the waist and it works beautifully! I am sure it will fit her for the next few years :) She is a strong swimmer so she had no problem adjusting to the tail. According to her this is the best present EVER!
customer_reviews.author: Debra Knapp

customer_reviews.title: Best best best
customer_reviews.text: Best gift for Xmas. Now the entire pool resort wants one.
customer_reviews.author: Pura V Da Paul

product_meta.title: Fin Fun Sparkle Mermaid Tails with Monofin for Swimming - Kid and Adult Sizes
feature_bullets: PRODUCT CARE: Hand wash or rinse in cold water. Dry flat. Do not bleach, iron or dry clean.
✅Fin Fun Sparkle mermaid tails INCLUDE the Patented Fin Fun Monofin. Our monofin and mermaid tail combination is flexible, realistic, and FUN!

✅The Patented Fin Fun Monofin has been designed for natural motion, optimal propulsion and maximum comfort. The Fin Fun monofin won't weigh you down, won't rip through the tail fabric, and the breathable neoprene fabric and open tail bottom allows for air and water to pass through.
✅The snug fitting Fin Fun monofin is excellent for swimming and removing the monofin from your feet is simple and fast; a light tug, a kick, and you're out.
✅Over Time all sparkle and shimmer tail fabric will eventually fade, change color, or flake off when used. See Product Description for care instructions.
✅Important sizing and safety information included in Product Description below. Coordinating and matching swimwear and accessories available.
